::Cerberus/Four Nightmares/Nemean Hydra Hydra::

    Cerberus saw the bulle=
ts come flying at him. He aimed his hand at them and let loose with fire, f=
rom all three mouths on his hand. The Bullets were incinerated. He then ope=
ned fire on this bot that had attacked him. He was then hit by some bullets=
 from another direction. He fired on them.
    The Four Nightmares fired al=
l of their weapons at Shredder, about 25 shots each and then turned and ran=
 toward the other bots, pulling swords or reapers.
    "Let none of these r=
ebels survive!!" Cerberus shouted to his troops. 
    Nemean Hydra let loos=
e on all rebels with his seven heads, one for each, but three for Shredder.=
 He fired volleys of fire balls at them.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  =
From: Yanshosh@... 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, Octobe=
r 18, 2000 8:59 PM
  Subject: Re: Destrons-Cerberus and the Four Nightmares=



  ::Shredder::

  Shredder's eyes narrow as he listens to Cerebrus' spea=
ch, the ex-Pred 
  Destron's hands sliding behing his back to hold his chai=
n guns.

  "Now listen here!" he says to the bots, "You can't just come in =
and take 
  over! Destrons, attack those bots, autoguns open fire!"

  He j=
umps into the air, flying up as he opens fire with both chainguns on 
  Cer=
ebrus, hoping the other destrons would follow suit.

        eGroups Sponso=
r
